attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Provides a yang:data-and-time encoding of the date the voucher was created.

attributes.name: expiresOn
attributes.description: Provides a yang:data-and-time encoding of the date the voucher expires..

attributes.name: assertion
attributes.description: The manufacurer's assertion of how the owner was verified. ['verified', 'logged', 'proximity'].

attributes.name: idevidIssuer
attributes.description:
The Authority Key Identifier OCTET STRING (as defined in
           Section 4.2.1.1 of RFC 5280) from the pledge's IDevID
           certificate.

attributes.name: pinnedDomainCert
attributes.description:
An X.509 v3 certificate structure, as specified by RFC 5280,
           using Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER) encoding, as defined
           in ITU-T X.690.

attributes.name: domainCertRevocationChecks
attributes.description:
A processing instruction to the device that it MUST (true)
           or MUST NOT (false) verify the revocation status for the
           pinned domain certificate. .
